title: Mens Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Dress Shirts for Men Cotton Button Down Shirt Regular Big and Tall Dress Shirts
description: MOISTURE WICKING TECHNOLOGY: Our long sleeve men's dress shirts are expertly crafted to wick moisture away from the skin, keeping you cool. Clean and Sleek: Our dress shirts for men boast a pocket-free design for a cleaner, more refined appearance
EXTRA LONG STAPLE COTTON: Discover the luxury in our men's dress shirts, expertly crafted from premium cotton, offering softness, strength, and durability for a comfortable and long-lasting fit

WRINKLE-RESISTANT FABRIC: Step into the ease of our non-iron fabric that effortlessly resists wrinkles, ensuring a crisp appearance all day. The low-maintenance nature of this button-down shirt for men makes it an indispensable part of any man's wardrobe
CLASSIC REGULAR FIT: Our men's long-sleeved button-down shirts provide a roomy, comfortable fit, accented by a classic collar and single cuff, complete with an easy-iron finish for effortless style

VERSATILE FOR ALL OCCASIONS: Ideal for business, weddings, parties, and dating, these long sleeve button up shirts for men effortlessly move from professional to casual settings, also serving as a perfect gift for holidays and special occasions
